property.code:
{{velocity wiki="true"}} ## wikimacro.parameters is available from XWiki 10.11.9, 11.3.2 and 11.6RC1 #if ("$!wikimacro.parameters" == '') #set ($wikimacro = {}) #set ($wikimacro.parameters = $xcontext.macro.params) ## $propertiesList should be a list, since the parameters are strings. #set ($propertiesList = $wikimacro.parameters.properties.split(", ")) #else #set ($propertiesList = $wikimacro.parameters.properties) #end ## #set ($className = $wikimacro.parameters.className) #set ($object = $doc.getObject($!className)) ## $propertiesList is by default equal to all parameters #if ("$!propertiesList" == '') #set ($propertiesList = $collectionstool.set) #set ($objectProperties = $object.getProperties()) #foreach ($prop in $objectProperties) #set ($discard = $propertiesList.add($prop.getName())) #end #end #set ($displayEmptyValues = $wikimacro.parameters.displayEmptyValues) #set ($blockClasses = $wikimacro.parameters.blockClasses) #set ($propertyNameClasses = $wikimacro.parameters.propertyNameClasses) #set ($propertyValuesClasses = $wikimacro.parameters.propertyValuesClasses) #set ($blockStyle = $wikimacro.parameters.style) #set ($blockBgColor = $wikimacro.parameters.backgroundColor) #set ($title = $wikimacro.parameters.title) #set ($titleStyle = $wikimacro.parameters.titleStyle) #set ($titleClasses = $wikimacro.parameters.titleClasses) #set ($propertyNameStyle = $wikimacro.parameters.propertyNameStyle) #set ($propertyValuesStyle = $wikimacro.parameters.propertyValueStyle) #if ("$!blockBgColor" != '') #if ("$!blockStyle" == '') #set ($blockStyle = '') #end #set($blockStyle = $blockStyle + " background: $blockBgColor;") #end ## #if ("$!object" != '') #set ($discard = $doc.use($object)) #if ("$!propertiesList" != '') {{html wiki="true"}} ## Block size (% class="$blockClasses" style="$blockStyle" %) ((( (% class=row %) ((( (% class="$titleClasses" style="$!titleStyle" %) ((($!title))) ))) ## Using editableProperty and data-property attributes to support inline editing. ## The inline editing feature is available from 12.3 #set ($editing = $xcontext.action == 'edit')
#foreach($prop in $propertiesList) ## By default, display empty properties. #if ($displayEmptyValues == 'true' || ($displayEmptyValues == 'false' && $doc.display($prop) != '')) (% class=row %) (((
$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName($prop, false, false))
$doc.display($prop)
))) #end #end
))) {{/html}} #end #end {{/velocity}}

property.description: Displays the properties of an object in a floating box (v1.1).
Object for which the properties are displayed
A list of ordered properties to be displayed for the object
Display or not a null property.
Classes for the name of a property
Classes for the value of a property
CSS for the block. Note that the background color is another parameter.
Classes for the title of the block
CSS for the title of the block
